noun.description: An aquatic or terrestrial annelid worm with suckers at both ends. Many species are bloodsucking parasites, especially of vertebrates, and others are predators.
A person who extorts profit from or sponges on others.
examples: they are leeches feeding off the hardworking majority
he's leeching off the kindness of others

origin: Late 15th century: probably of Scandinavian origin and related to Swedish lik, Danish lig, denoting a rope sewn round the edge of a sail to stop the canvas tearing.
